--- create_change_stream_for_tables.sql
CREATE CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name FOR table_name1, table_name2

--- AST
&ast.CreateChangeStream{
  Create: 0,
  Name:   &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 21,
    NameEnd: 39,
    Name:    "change_stream_name",
  },
  Watch: &ast.ChangeStreamWatch{
    WatchTables: []*ast.ChangeStreamWatchTable{
      &ast.ChangeStreamWatchTable{
        TableName: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 44,
          NameEnd: 55,
          Name:    "table_name1",
        },
        Columns: []*ast.Ident(nil),
        Rparen:  0,
      },
      &ast.ChangeStreamWatchTable{
        TableName: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 57,
          NameEnd: 68,
          Name:    "table_name2",
        },
        Columns: []*ast.Ident(nil),
        Rparen:  0,
      },
    },
    SetForAllPos: 0,
  },
  Options: (*ast.ChangeStreamOptions)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name FOR table_name1, table_name2
